inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getServerlessLifecyclePolicy.

type.description: Type of lifecycle policy. Must be `retention`.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getServerlessLifecyclePolicy.

createdDate.description: The date the lifecycle policy was created.

description.description: Description of the policy. Typically used to store information about the permissions defined in the policy.

lastModifiedDate.description: The date the lifecycle policy was last modified.

policy.description: JSON policy document to use as the content for the new policy.
